articles.title: iPhone And Android Users Will Soon Have The Ability To Send End-To-End Encrypted RCS Messages, Bringing The Security Offering Closer To iMessage - Wccftech
articles.description: Apple has announced that it would be adopting the new RCS standard that comes with end-to-end encryption for enhanced security
articles.content: For years, there has been debate regarding the lack of support for iPhone users messaging Android users, and this was finally addressed with iOS 18, where Apple introduced RCS support in order to mak… [+2476 chars]
